dmca.title: [ABUSE] Copyright infringement
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: The Planet Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Tuesday, May 31, 2005 6:00 PM
To: admin@about-personal-loans.com
Cc: copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: [Fwd: [ABUSE] Copyright infringement]

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1


Your email is being sent to our copyright-related legal counsel at the
address copyright@theplanet.com for consideration.

- -------- Original Message --------
Subject: [ABUSE] Copyright infringement
Date: Sat, 28 May 2005 05:59:06 -0400 (EDT)
From: admin@about-personal-loans.com
To: info@technoedge.net
CC: abuse@theplanet.com

Hello,

We just found that you have used some of the articles from our site
(www.about-personal-loans.com) on your site without following the publishing
guidelines. We request you remove those articles immediately.
The articles can be found on your site at:

http://www.resolvedebtproblems.com/5_signs_you_need_a_personal_loan.htm
http://www.resolvedebtproblems.com/managing_finances_for_a_better_c.htm
http://www.resolvedebtproblems.com/choosing_the_right_debt_manageme.htm

Legal Department
www.about-personal-loans.com


- --
Thanks,
Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/aup/
-----BEGIN PGP SIGNATURE-----
Version: GnuPG v1.4.1 (MingW32)
Comment: Using GnuPG with Thunderbird - http://enigmail.mozdev.org

iD8DBQFCnOyBvK/XpJs6oyURAs1WAKCYHHugsSzg3KjfwNIGk5TGVJkEZQCeNcaC
2ZXThH66mq7zALqGaw9RNtE=
=zCoY
-----END PGP SIGNATURE-----
